headline: Microtome Market Insights, Competitive Landscape, and Forecast Report 2024-2032 | Fully Automated Microtomes to Drive Market Growth with Advanced Diagnostic Capabilities
summary: The global microtome market is projected to grow at a 6.13% CAGR from 2025 to 2032, driven by rising chronic disease cases like cancer, cardiovascular diseases, and increased R&D activities. North America leads due to cutting-edge medical infrastructure and high incidence of diseases. Key players include Thermo Fisher, Leica Biosystems, and Sakura Finetek. Fully automated microtomes, pivotal for precise tissue sectioning, are expected to dominate the market, essential for diagnostics and researc
